description: Eventually the collection of chests becomes too much to handle. While a better storage solution isn't quite possible yet, hooking up a searchable terminal would still greatly help with this issue.
A small ME System consisting of a connected to a exposes the inventory to the terminal. Anything connected via storage busses will be acessable via the terminal.
This could be very useful when paired with an

You'll need something to power this network, a should do the trick. For some reason, any generators after the first seem to stop working. It's unlikely that a network this small will need more power though.
Make sure that these three devices are hooked up via ME Cables.
A free storage bus, since you can't make them at your current tech level.
